header: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy unit to sign hotel leasing contract worth 190.6 mln yuan
body: * Says its unit will sign hotel leasing contract worth 190.6 million yuan and leasing period of 12 months

header: BRIEF-Dell EMC, General Dynamics and Microsoft awarded $1 bln contract
body:
* Dell EMC, General Dynamics and Microsoft awarded $1 billion contract to advance USAF’s it transformation

* Dell EMC - co, General Dynamics, Microsoft awarded $1 billion five-year U.S. Air force contract to implement a cloud hosted enterprise services program​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

header: BRIEF-Essity and Microsoft partner on Internet of Things
body:
* Essity and Microsoft partner on internet of things

* Essity will implement Microsoft’s Azure cloud-based computing platform Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Stockholm Newsroom)
